fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Business and Industry, Taxation, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Sport
eu_initiatives: Digital agenda, intellectual property rights, culture and media policy, audiovisual policy, sports policy, competition policy, trade policy, research and development as well as innovation policy, EU Strategy for cultural diplomacy
goals__remit: Consultancy specialised in the cultural and entertainment sectors. We provide strategic counselling on policy issues as well as conduct legal analyses of international, European and national legal regimes and help companies identify EU funding opportunities and develop the project.
